Html:
Hi

Please could someone post some c# code for the above conversion or point me in the right direction?

Thanks
Simon

Simon

You need to look at the Ordnance Survey web site - http://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/business-and-government/help-and-support/navigation-technology/os-net/formats-for-developers.html

This provides a guide and a download of a Windows 32 DLL which will transform the coordinates.

Regards

Paul
